name: 40+ Retro Media Assets
description:
40+ Retro Media Assets! Based (loosely) on a 16x16 tileset.

Throwback to the funky decades where inferior media is king! 

PERMISSIONS On download, you will hold non-exclusive licence to use these assets for personal and/or commercial use.

  • Please do not redistribute this pack.
  • Credit is not essential, but appreciated.
  • Comment or contact with queries!
